summary: my own char save file which contains no mods installed except dawnguard, heartfire
descriptionHtml:
this is save file i had before i installed my first mod of skyrim so its best file for experimenting mods which may cause you problems and you are unable to sort it out.

if you use lots of mods and are facing unknown weird errors this file is a best backup to start with...

game progress done i guess around 30%+

married to aela, adopted 2 kids, home at markath, allaince linked to werewolfs, version of the save V1.7

if u have dragonborn installed once u use this save file will start all dragonborn quest.

Char Description:

Race : Altmer
Sex   : Male
Level : 81-83(More Saves at Different Locations)
Name : Teiru
Clan Race : Werewolf
Relationship : Aela as Wife
Kids Adpoted : Dorthe, Lucia
Base Home : Markath

Requirements:
Dawnguard, Heartfire
Game Version : V1.7(will work on latest version of skyrim too i.e V1.7+)

Install Info:

1. Copy the Skyrim(1.7) to where your save file of skyrim is stored than rename it to Skyrim. NOTE:Be sure to backup your own save as am giving up my own entire save skyrim folder.

2. First open my skyrim folder, than go to saves their you find the basic save files in case u need my save.ess file particularly.

NOTE:let me make clear one thing guys i use more than 200+ mods as a result my main save file was crashed resulting me to reinstall skyrim and all mods.
after a long procedure i had this save file with which i was able to sort out few mods which were causing bugs in my main save, so if you are worrying about the images than ignore it as i took screenie from my present mod list installed.

as you can see the mods were activated when i loaded the save file, anyone can predict it by seeing the screenie.
as a matter of fact the save file works fine.
its only a backup file if got any doubt just try it once.

and let me make clear this is the save file when i only had skyrim with dawnguard and heartfire plugin with no other files installed

if got any doubt make a comment post and i will reply about it
author: nikhil123
